statements: SELECT * FROM iot_security_alerts;
SELECT id, alert_message, alert_timestamp FROM iot_security_alerts WHERE is_processed = true;
SELECT device_id, alert_message FROM iot_security_alerts WHERE device_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM iot_security_alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, alert_message FROM iot_security_alerts WHERE alert_timestamp <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM iot_security_alerts WHERE is_processed = TRUE;
SELECT device_id, alert_message FROM iot_security_alerts WHERE alert_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, alert_message, alert_timestamp FROM iot_security_alerts WHERE device_id = 100 ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT distinct(device_id) FROM iot_security_alerts WHERE alert_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT id, alert_message FROM iot_security_alerts WHERE alert_timestamp > '2022-03-01' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, device_status FROM devices WHERE device_status = 'active';
SELECT device_name, last_activity FROM devices ORDER BY last_activity DESC;
SELECT alert_id, alert_message, alert_timestamp FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_status, last_activity FROM devices ORDER BY device_name ASC, last_activity DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_status FROM devices WHERE device_status = 'online';
SELECT device_name, last_activity FROM devices ORDER BY last_activity DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_status FROM devices WHERE device_status = 'offline' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_timestamp > '2021-09-01 00:00:00';
SELECT d.device_name, sa.alert_message FROM devices d INNER JOIN security_alerts sa ON d.device_id = sa.device_id;
SELECT * FROM device_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, data FROM device_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT device_id, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM security_logs GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM device_data WHERE data LIKE '%error%';
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM security_logs GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY total_logs DESC;
SELECT * FROM device_data WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT data, timestamp FROM device_data WHERE id = 10;
SELECT device_id, data FROM device_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Security Breach';
SELECT device_id, log_message FROM security_logs WHERE log_level = 'ERROR' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM device_data;
SELECT device_id, data->>'value' AS data_value, timestamp FROM device_data WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT trigger_name, trigger_description FROM triggers ORDER BY trigger_name DESC;
SELECT id, alert_timestamp AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS alert_timestamp_utc FROM alert_logs WHERE alert_id = 5;
SELECT team_name, LENGTH(team_email) AS email_length FROM security_teams WHERE team_email LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT * FROM device_data WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) FROM device_data GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT trigger_name, trigger_description FROM triggers WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT id, team_name, team_email FROM security_teams ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM alert_logs WHERE alert_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND alert_message LIKE '%error%';
SELECT * FROM IoT_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM IoT_devices WHERE device_type = 'Sensor';
SELECT device_name, last_activity FROM IoT_devices ORDER BY last_activity DESC;
SELECT log_id, activity_type, activity_time FROM Activity_logs WHERE activity_type = 'Error' ORDER BY activity_time ASC;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM Security_teams INNER JOIN Team_assignments ON Security_teams.team_id = Team_assignments.team_id WHERE Team_assignments.device_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM IoT_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM IoT_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, last_activity FROM IoT_devices WHERE device_type='Sensor';
SELECT A.log_id, A.activity_type, B.device_name FROM Activity_logs A JOIN IoT_devices B ON A.device_id = B.device_id;
SELECT T.team_name, D.device_name FROM Team_assignments TA JOIN Security_teams T ON TA.team_id = T.team_id JOIN IoT_devices D ON TA.device_id = D.device_id;
